AboutPage.hero_title: Building Infrastructure That Scales With Your Ambitions
AboutPage.hero_subtitle: From bare metal to Kubernetes clusters — over a decade of engineering the systems that keep businesses running.
AboutPage.company_p1: DevOpsFlow is the consulting and engineering arm of Skynet Hosting SRL, a Moldova-based IT company operating under the Moldova IT Park program. We hold our own Autonomous System (AS48296) and maintain direct relationships with upstream providers — because we don't just configure infrastructure, we understand it from the wire up.
AboutPage.company_p2: We partner with companies across the United States, Switzerland, and the European Union, delivering DevOps engineering, cloud architecture, and infrastructure automation. Whether you're running a three-server setup or orchestrating workloads across multiple cloud providers, we bring the same rigor and attention to reliability.
AboutPage.company_registered: Registered in Chișinău, Moldova — operating globally.
AboutPage.founder_p1: I started my career in 2012 at Moldtelecom's Network Operations Center, where I learned that every second of downtime costs more than any amount of prevention. That lesson stuck.
AboutPage.founder_p2: Over the next decade, I moved through increasingly complex environments — from managing Cisco and Juniper networks at Orange Moldova, to building containerized platforms at SaltEdge, to deploying Kubernetes clusters across hybrid clouds at EBS Integrator. Along the way, I picked up certifications not as résumé padding, but because each one solved a real problem I was facing at work.
AboutPage.founder_p3: Today, I serve as Senior DevOps Engineer for DuoCircle (San Diego, CA), where I manage production infrastructure handling millions of requests daily. In parallel, I run Skynet Hosting SRL, providing DevOps consulting and infrastructure services to companies that need senior-level expertise without the overhead of a full-time hire.
AboutPage.founder_approach: My approach is simple: understand the business problem first, then engineer the smallest solution that solves it reliably.
AboutPage.tl_moldtelecom_desc: First taste of production systems, incident management, and the weight of an SLA.
AboutPage.tl_stm_desc: Managed a team of six, designed network architectures, and learned that the best infrastructure is the one nobody notices.
AboutPage.tl_orange_role: Senior Network/System Administrator → IT Network Team Lead
AboutPage.tl_orange_desc: Five years managing enterprise-grade Cisco, Juniper, and FortiGate infrastructure. Built monitoring stacks with Nagios, Zabbix, and Cacti. Deployed RADIUS/TACACS+ authentication systems.
AboutPage.tl_saltedge_desc: First deep dive into container orchestration, Chef provisioning, and AWS cloud services.
AboutPage.tl_gilat_desc: Kubernetes and Docker in regulated environments. Satellite infrastructure has zero tolerance for "it works on my machine."
AboutPage.tl_alexhost_desc: Led cross-functional teams, aligned IT strategy with business objectives. Understood margins, capacity planning, and the cost of technical debt.
AboutPage.tl_ebs_desc: Built GitOps workflows with ArgoCD, deployed Kubernetes on Proxmox and public clouds. Reduced infrastructure setup time by 50% through Ansible and Terraform automation.
AboutPage.tl_duocircle_desc: Managing production Ubuntu servers, AWS EKS workloads, and CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions. Architecting high-availability solutions.
AboutPage.tl_skynet_desc: Providing DevOps consulting, cloud infrastructure design, and managed services to international clients.
AboutPage.certs_subtitle: Every certification I hold was earned to solve a real engineering challenge — not to decorate a wall.
AboutPage.cert_cka_desc: Production-grade Kubernetes cluster management, troubleshooting, networking, and security.
AboutPage.cert_ccnp_desc: Enterprise routing, switching, and network design at scale.
AboutPage.cert_lpic_desc: System administration, service management, and Linux internals.
AboutPage.cert_nse_desc: Firewall architecture, VPN design, and network threat management.
AboutPage.cert_juniper_desc: Enterprise switching, security fundamentals, and network automation.
AboutPage.cert_mikrotik_desc: Wireless and network administration for edge deployments.
AboutPage.process_s1_desc: We start with a conversation, not a quote. What does your infrastructure look like today? What's breaking? What's keeping you up at night? We ask the uncomfortable questions early so there are no surprises later.
AboutPage.process_s2_desc: Before writing a single line of Terraform, we map out the target state. Network diagrams, cost projections, migration paths, rollback plans. You see everything before we touch anything.
AboutPage.process_s3_desc: Infrastructure as Code, always. Every change is version-controlled, peer-reviewed, and deployed through CI/CD. No SSH-and-pray. No undocumented changes.
AboutPage.process_s4_desc: We document everything. Runbooks, architecture decisions, monitoring dashboards. When the engagement ends, you own a system you can maintain — or we stay on for ongoing managed services.
AboutPage.value_1_title: We Build What We'd Want to Inherit
AboutPage.value_1_desc: Every engineer has inherited someone else's infrastructure nightmare. We build systems with the next person in mind — documented, automated, and predictable.
AboutPage.value_2_title: We Optimize for Reliability, Not Complexity
AboutPage.value_2_desc: The most elegant solution is often the simplest one that meets the requirements. We don't add Kubernetes to a problem that needs a cron job.
AboutPage.value_3_desc: No jargon walls. No hiding behind tickets. If something's broken, you'll hear it from us before you notice it yourself. If a timeline slips, you'll know why.
AboutPage.value_4_desc: Our infrastructure code lives in Git. Our monitoring dashboards are shared. Our invoices are clear. Trust isn't built with NDAs — it's built with access.
AboutPage.cta_desc: Whether you need a Kubernetes migration, a CI/CD overhaul, or just a second pair of eyes on your architecture — let's start with a conversation.
